messages.cli.description: Understand git changes, generate a normalized commit message, and optionally apply/push in one command.
messages.cli.help.model: Override LAZY_COMMIT_OPENAI_MODEL_NAME (also used for Gemini model id).
messages.cli.help.max_context_tokens: Override LAZY_COMMIT_MAX_CONTEXT_TOKENS for token-aware context compression.
messages.cli.help.count_tokens: Count tokens for TEXT and exit. If TEXT is omitted, read from stdin.
messages.cli.help.token_model: Tokenizer model for token counting and estimation. In --count-tokens mode defaults to {default_token_model}; in generation mode defaults to --model/LAZY_COMMIT_OPENAI_MODEL_NAME.
messages.cli.help.token_encoding: Override tokenizer encoding for token counting and prompt estimation (for example: o200k_base).
messages.cli.help.apply: Run git commit with the generated message.
messages.cli.help.stage_all: Stage all tracked/untracked changes before commit.
messages.cli.help.yes: Skip confirmation prompt when --apply is set.
messages.cli.help.show_context: Print trimmed git context sent to the model.
messages.cli.help.show_raw_response: Print raw model response before parsing.
messages.cli.help.copy: Copy generated commit message to clipboard (default: enabled).
messages.cli.help.lang: UI language (for example: en, zh-CN). Defaults to LAZY_COMMIT_LANG or English.
messages.cli.help.list_languages: List supported UI languages and exit.
messages.cli.help.check_i18n: Validate locale catalogs for missing keys and placeholder mismatches.
messages.cli.error.no_staged_changes: No staged changes. Use --stage-all or stage files manually.
messages.cli.log.no_local_changes: No local changes found. Nothing to generate.
messages.cli.log.estimated_prompt_tokens: Estimated prompt tokens: total {total_tokens_after} / context {context_tokens_after} (model={model_name}, encoding={encoding_name}).
messages.cli.log.context_compression_applied: Context exceeded token budget; compression applied: {steps}.
messages.cli.log.preview_only: Preview only. Re-run with --apply to create commit.
messages.clipboard.error.command_not_found: Clipboard command not found. Install one of: {commands}.
messages.clipboard.error.copy_failed_all: Clipboard copy failed for all commands: {failures}
